description: I. Arrangements under paragraph 183(4) of schedule A1 to the Mental Capacity Act 2005 between the Secretary of State and the Welsh Ministers. 2 p. II. Local authority circular: the Mental Capacity Act. March 2009. Ref: 11555. Incl. annexes. 11 p. III. Dear colleague letter dated 19/03/2005 from Lucy Bonnerjea (Mental capacity act implementation, Department of Health) regarding resources available in 2009 / 10 for the Mental Capacity Act. Incl. annexes. 6 p.
